h1_title: The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen
content: The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen are optional secret bosses you can find by entering Chapter 3's Secret Area of Mount Mei in Black Myth: Wukong. You'll need to complete all chapters' secret areas and an elusive side quest to access the area, then take on the incredibly strong Erlang, The Sacred Divinity. Completing this Kaiju fight will allow you to unlock the game's secret ending.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "The_Four_Heavenly_Kings_and_Erlang_Shen.md", under the primary heading "The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen". The content is presented below:

The Four Heavenly Kings and Erlang Shen are optional secret bosses you can find by entering Chapter 3's Secret Area of Mount Mei in Black Myth: Wukong. You'll need to complete all chapters' secret areas and an elusive side quest to access the area, then take on the incredibly strong Erlang, The Sacred Divinity. Completing this Kaiju fight will allow you to unlock the game's secret ending.
